meanings.definition: A member of an indigenous Australian people of the southeastern part of the Northern Territory.
meanings.sent1: The wooraris lived in the southeastern part of the Northern Territory.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the wooraris in my history class.
meanings.sent3: The wooraris had a big celebration in their village.
meanings.sent4: The wooraris were like a close-knit family.
meanings.sent5: The wooraris' traditions were passed down for generations.

meanings.sent1: Do you know how to speak wooraris?
meanings.sent2: Learning wooraris can be challenging but rewarding.
meanings.sent3: The children quickly picked up the wooraris language.
meanings.sent4: Her fluency in wooraris impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of wooraris poetry is captivating.
